snippet: The Canadiens’ loss, combined with Tampa Bay’s win over Philadelphia, hurt Montreal’s chances of starting the playoffs on home ice.
abstract: NHL Roundup; New York Islanders beat Montreal Canadiens, 2-0; other hockey scores noted.
lead_paragraph: The Canadiens’ loss, combined with Tampa Bay’s win over Philadelphia, hurt Montreal’s chances of starting the playoffs on home ice.

headline.main: Isles Top Canadiens; Devils Fall in Shootout
headline.print_headline: Isles Top Canadiens; Devils Fall in Shootout
